class SXF_OStream

Interface

Public Members
SXF_OStream(ostream& out)
ostream& cfe_error()
ostream& syntax_error()
int set_lineno()
int increment_lineno()
void write_line(const char* line)
void write_status()

Description

The OStream class represents the SXF front end echo writer and an error counter.

Member Description

SXF_OStream(ostream& out)

Constructor.

ostream& cfe_error()

Return an output stream + increment a front end error counter.

ostream& syntax_error()

Return an output stream + increment a syntax error counter.

int set_lineno()

Set a line number (1).

int increment_lineno()

Increment a line number.

void write_line(const char* line)

Write a line.

void write_status()

Write a status.
